headline: Colgate Gears Up for Q1 Earnings: Here's What You Should Know
summary: CL's first-quarter results are likely to show sales pressure from macro headwinds, partially offset by margin gains from pricing and productivity.

headline: Unlocking Q1 Potential of Colgate-Palmolive (CL): Exploring Wall Street Estimates for Key Metrics
summary: Beyond analysts' top -and-bottom-line estimates for Colgate-Palmolive (CL), evaluate projections for some of its key metrics to gain a better insight into how the business might have performed for the quarter ended March 2025.
